mapper.select: select c.user_nick, b.* from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from tbl_hobby where is_del = 'N' order by view_cnt desc, like_cnt desc) a) b left join tbl_memberdetail c on b.hobby_writer = c.user_id where rnum between 1 and 10

select c.user_nick, b.* from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from tbl_hobby where is_del = 'N' and to_char(reg_date, 'mm') = to_char(sysdate, 'mm') order by view_cnt desc, like_cnt desc) a) b left join tbl_memberdetail c on b.hobby_writer = c.user_id where rnum between 1 and 10

select * from (select rownum rnum, a.user_nick, a.user_grade, c.name from (select * from tbl_memberdetail where user_id in (select user_id from tbl_memberinfo where is_del = 'N') order by follower_cnt desc) a left join tbl_membergrade c on a.user_grade = c.cd where a.user_grade = 1 order by follower_cnt desc) where rnum between 1 and 10
